name: Math Memory Game
description:
Math Memory is an educational game for everyone especially for kids. Math Memory Game is a good brain test and you can improve your math calculations speed. After playing this cool Math Memory Game your kids will definitely will calculate faster.


Math Memory Game for Kids


• Educational Game to help your kid learn Maths.
• Improving your Kids math calculation speed.
• Excellent for Memory improvement for Kids.
• Kids will Learn Maths while having Fun.
• Helps to improve kid’s memory & analytical capabilities in one Game.
• Cool & Attractive Graphics for kids.


Memory Maths Game-Play

• Multiple Levels of Difficulty.
• Random option makes it difficult to win.
• Timer to make it interesting. 
• Can select from multiple calculation options.
• Can select Addition, Subtraction or Random modes.
• Share your kids score with friends.
